title: “Wing of a building” means part of a building with independent access, staircase & lift connected to other parts with common basement/stilt/ podium/terrace/common wall/connecting passages
clause_text: “Wing of a building” means part of a building with independent access, staircase & lift connected to other parts with common basement/stilt/ podium/terrace/common wall/connecting passages.
